name: Better Together (Haley Price, Geoff, Trexus183)
description:
In the office, you've got to give it your all... so give IT your all. Submit.

Bring the whole office together in this goofy action fighting game! Play as the office's friendly local Blob Monster, and save your coworkers by brainwashing them. Make an army to do battle with the enemy Blob, complete with its own hoard of zombie-employees. 

Move together. 

Fight together. 

Be Better Together.

Team Hammered Octopus:

Our 2021 Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam team is thrilled to submit our game, "Better Together." Check out our portfolios and social media if you'd like to see more of our work!

Geoff- Programming, Design, and Audio

Julius - Programming and Design

Erick - Environment Art

David - Art and Level Design

Paul - Character Art and Animation

Haley - UI Design
